entries.highlight: Had a great workout session and finished reading a chapter
entries.journal: Today was a productive day. I woke up early and went for a 30-minute run. The weather was perfect for it. After breakfast, I spent some time reading my current book - it's really engaging. In the afternoon, I meditated for 15 minutes which helped me feel more centered. Overall, I'm feeling good about my progress on my habits.

entries.highlight: Completed all my habits and had a relaxing evening
entries.journal: Another great day! I did a full body workout this morning - felt really strong. Read for an hour during lunch break. Meditated twice today, once in the morning and once before bed. Drank plenty of water throughout the day. Feeling really good about maintaining my routine. The consistency is paying off.
